description: {"blocks":[{"key":"93eo","text":"This protocol outlines procedures for Stereotactic Injections in Mouse and Rat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"epla0","text":"Anesthesia Reagents Needed and Preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2bg5","text":"Rats (60 mg/kg Ketamine ; 0.4 mg/kg medetomidine):","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20keo","text":"        • 0.60 ml Nimatek + 0.40 ml Domitor + 1.00 ml Saline = 2 ml anesthetic cocktail ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cms3","text":"        • Use: 0.15 ml / 100 g of body weight ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj5od","text":"        • Administration route: IP ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ssur","text":"        • If the injection is given properly, the rat will sleep in 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddmj6","text":"Mouse (75 mg/kg ketamine ; 1 mg/kg medetomidine):","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95ke5","text":"        • 0.15 ml Nimatek + 0.20 ml Domitor + 1.65 ml Saline = 2 ml anesthetic cocktail ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm4qg","text":"        • Use: 0.1 ml / 10 g of body weight ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eebdm","text":"        • Administration route: IP ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qm1b","text":"        • If the injection is given properly, the mouse will sleep in 2 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d35pe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9su2d","text":"Reversal of Anesthesia Reagents Needed and Preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50nq7","text":"Rats:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vg0u","text":"        • 1.0 ml Antisedan + 4.0 ml Saline = 5 ml antidote ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gqpq","text":"        • Use: 0.2 ml / 100g of body weight ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf13p","text":"        • Administration route: IP ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4eha2","text":"Mouse:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebva2","text":"        • 0.1 ml Antisedan + 9.9 ml Saline = 10 ml antidote ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92taa","text":"        • Use: 0.1 ml / 10 g of body weight ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":15,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpv23","text":"        • Administration route: IP ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93qic","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7f2q2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flshl","text":"Analgesia (Post - operative analgesia) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d62a","text":"Dilute Vetergesic 10x ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qnn3","text":"Rats: 150 µl / 100 g of body weight ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbk8m","text":"Mice: 30 µl / 10 g of body weight ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n787","text":"Analgesic effect will last 8-12 hours ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60t1l","text":"Put liquid Xylocaïne drops upon the skull if you notice that the animal is suffering pain.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5fet","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48mun","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vi1f","text":"Materials Needed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5khnm","text":"Big scissors (for the hair), small scissors, curved forceps, needle holder, spatula, scalpel holder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l3u2","text":"Xylocaïne 2%, joodalcohol, Vidisic ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dudlm","text":"Chip(holder) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tahl","text":"Magnifier, blade nr 10, wire 3-0 (Rat) / 4-0 (Mouse) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6354v","text":"10 ml syringe + pink needle, small tissues (sterile) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9uuko","text":"Small pots to rinse the Hamilton syringe (RBS, ETOH, PBS, PBS, AD) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chckl","text":"4x 1 ml syringe + needle (anesthesia, reversed, painkiller, +1) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sguv","text":"Hamilton syringe + needle ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cd78","text":"Pipet + tips + eppendorfs","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"mkde","text":"Remove hair and put   on top of the head and into the ears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","guid":"3E98FB30243211EBA5AB2FA60AC23CC5","id":0,"label":"Xylocaïne gel ","unit":124}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ffot4","text":"Put a chip under the skin to mark the animal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfqm","text":"Fix the animal into the stereotactic apparatus (use the mouse adaptor for mouse and only the ear clamps for rat). Put a tissue over the animal to keep it warm during surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7eknc","text":"Make sure that the left and right side of the skull is positioned as straight as possible (ears).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bm0cp","text":"Use   to clean the top of the head and make an incision with a scalpel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","guid":"65627C50243211EBA5AB2FA60AC23CC5","id":0,"label":"joodalcohol","unit":124}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fs9f","text":"Clean the skull with a spatula and saline and let dry until bregma and lambda are clearly visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ukmd","text":"Check volume and injection speed of the pump, rinse Hamilton syringe with RBS, ETOH and PBS. (Coat the syringe by taking a full syringe of vector and discard in eppendorf). Put vector in the syringe (± 1.5 µl more than you want to inject) and make sure there are no air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hpqo","text":"Make sure bregma and lambda have the same height, correct the position of the head if there’s a difference of more than 0.02cm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87ej8","text":"Put the needle at the right position using bregma as a reference (find the right coordinates using the stereotactic atlas of mouse or rat).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mni2","text":"Drill a small hole into the skull at this position until the dura mater is visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"27lq5","text":"Make a small hole into the dura mater using a thin needle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qo4r","text":"Put the Hamilton needle at the right position (go down slowly to prevent tissue damage) and wait for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":101,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"50C3E9A020B811EBB25B757A3430DFE6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kla1","text":"Wait   after injection in order to let the vector diffuse into the brain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f22sf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"5E1F1A2020B811EBB25B757A3430DFE6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"701md","text":"Rinse Hamilton syringe with RBS, ETOH, PBS and AD.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
